name: The Great Tsunami Thief
description:
The Great Tsunami Thief is an infamous connoisseur of trinkets and treasure facing treacherous tribulations of trials and engulfing tsunami waves. 

A fast-paced collectathon platformer. Steal loot and don't get swallowed by the incoming tsunami.

A game created by a team of students at the University of Wisconsin - Stout.

Gamepad is supported.

Press Kit available here
